website_summaries.verdict: Almost every parent claims that the sounds are amazing, and that their babies are thoroughly entertained by it.
pros: Colours and sounds are very attractive to kids, and the toys are entertaining
cons: Some of the toys have stickers that babies tend to chew off
The base can wobble a bit
The seat can be difficult for a child to swivel

customer_reviews.title: Steer Clear
customer_reviews.text: We LOVED this initially. Our son enjoys the sounds and all of the attachments. We have had this for just a couple of months and today were shocked to see that our little one has taken off paper and PAINT with his teeth. I mean, this is meant for babies our little guy barely has a tooth poking through his gums and I am livid that he ingested God knows what playing with this toy. I will be contacting the manufacturer, I'm not sure Amazon can do anything. We are taking off all of the attachments and adding our own safe attachments to the rings.
customer_reviews.author: Kat B

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this, but the ribbons in the ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, but the ribbons in the crab are defective and unravel, creating a choking hazard for kids.
customer_reviews.author: C. Walton

customer_reviews.title: A really great learning and safe toy for an infant.
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 month old grandson loves this and seems to like it more each time he visits. He will spend between 10-30 minutes playing with it until we need to do something else (a nice little break). We have had it for a couple of months now and it is well built, sturdy, has smooth surfaces and really seems to entertain an infant. The ability to change from musical tunes to sounds is nice (there are 3 keys on the keyboard for the baby to strike). This will probably be a great toy until the baby starts cruising or walking but the quality is nice enough that future babies should enjoy it also.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H. Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: Non working music attachment and company will not respond to ...
customer_reviews.text: Non working music attachment and company will not respond to emails. Very dissatisfied. Will not purchase anything from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Mynhier

customer_reviews.title: Love this, even for a very young child
customer_reviews.text: We have our 2 month old in this because he doesn't want to lay down and he loves it. It is helping him to develop a lot faster too. He smiles when we put him in it. We NEVER leave him unattended! Product is made of good materials. We would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn McCreary

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I put our littl girl in it when she was about 3 months old to see how she fit, before I put it all together and she loved it! She also loved chewing on her seat since she's teething. The price is also great. I looked at used ones in consignment stores and they ran the same price for something not nearly as nice or in that great of condition.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Defective Seat
customer_reviews.text: I loved the nautical theme. Unfortunately a piece of the baby seat came defective. Extremely dangerous, how’s baby supposed to enjoy the activities. Isn’t there an inspection for these before they go out. Please be careful when putting together! I hope that yours is not defective.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased item for my 5-month old. She absolutely loves it and it gives me a break to drink a warm cup of coffee lol. It is easy to assemble and clean. Her feet touch the bottom and once she’s tired she will sit instead of stand. I only wish the product had more musical options and that it constantly played musical without having to constantly press the music keypad. Nonetheless, my daughter enjoys it. The bright colors are appealing and the product is safe. We have not had any issues with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: colors are great and it was relatively easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: it's enormous. that would be my only complaint. colors are great and it was relatively easy to put together. I wish the seat was a bit more padded and comfortable. it is really really huge and we have such a small apartment, I actually can't wait to sell it because it takes up more space than some other jumpers I've seen. son seems to like sitting in it for about 20 minutes and then he's over it. Also, my son didn't like it until about 6 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This item is very cute. I bought it for my 7 month old nephew and he loves it. It is very easy to put together and the plastic is very strong and sturdy, The seat is removable so you can wash it whenever it is needed. Make sure you follow the owners manual as the toys go in their specific place for easy reach and use. I din't and I ended up putting the items in the wrong location and when I realized that I tried to remove the toys but I couldn't. They lock in and I wasn't able to remove the ones that where already on there. Still pretty though and I like the item itself.
customer_reviews.author: NORMA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: after working for an hour to assemble this product, i found that the seat (the black plastic part is defective, which was one of the last steps. I called the manufacture and spoke with someone that didn’t have a clue and took my information down and will have someone call me back in 2-3 days. I will not wait for a call. That is horrible service. The product was not easy to assemble, and the directions were horrible. If i can figure out how to get the parts off, i will be packing this piece of crap back up and returning to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: To our surprise it says the colors in three languages English Spanish and French ( guess I didn’t read the description well) I don’t have anything negative we like the Baby Einstein toys
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves to play in her “aquarium” that’s what we call it . To our surprise it says the colors in three languages English Spanish and French ( guess I didn’t read the description well) I don’t have anything negative we like the Baby Einstein toys.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco/Delmarie

customer_reviews.title: Mommy and child approved!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this product took very little time to assemble. It took us about 5 minutes from box to use. Lots of different attached toys made playtime interesting for my child and allowed me to get a few things done around the house, knowing he was safe in the product. The seat is easy to wash and the plastic itself is easy to wipe down. There is even a little compartment to put a few snacks in, which was very convenient. This would be the perfect baby shower gift for the parents to be in your life!
customer_reviews.author: Taija

customer_reviews.title: Paint comes off, and there are stickers.
customer_reviews.text: For as much as this thing costs, you'd think they could afford to print the colors onto the plastic. This is a good looking toy, but the colors on the wales and addons will come off as soon as your kid puts it into their mouth. A unbelievable flaw for a child's toy.
customer_reviews.author: KittyCat

customer_reviews.title: No regrets. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this I had poured over dozens of these type products. We have carpet so wheels were a no, and I wanted something that would grow with my 6 month old. After exhaustive research we ordered this one. I wasn't 100% on it, but it looked most like what we needed. When it came it took me about 10-15 minutes to fully set up (while being mailed by a toddler who wanted desperately to see what was in the box). The material is good quality, and it is bright and fun. My son loves it, and adjusting the height is super easy. Taking the seat out to wash is easy, and it is machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie Missy

customer_reviews.title: he was 4 months he liked the fact of sitting in it
customer_reviews.text: My Husband & I got this for our Grandson @ Christmas time, he was 4 months he liked the fact of sitting in it ! The Flamily gets in the floor & plays with him, showing him things ! Well ! Now that he is 6 months old ! He loves playing with everything, he just talks & touches ! He loves it ! We do recommend the Rhythm of the Reef Activity center !
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Day

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5-month old grandson. He enjoys all of the toys attached to the saucer, and especially likes the mirror. One of the reasons I selected this saucer is because it can be raised up as the child grows. My grandson is now 8 months old and we just raised it to the 2nd notch. He is tall for his age so the lowest height might be suitable longer for some babies. He still loves this and jumps and plays in it for a long time. One day I even caught him "talking" to the octopus.
customer_reviews.author: goose

customer_reviews.title: My 2 1/2 year old and 7 month old love this toy
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old and 7 month old love this toy! It is very colorful and the toys are all something that grabs their attention. I love the piano and the multiple options for music...not to mention the two sound levels and off switch. I put it together in 15 minutes and that is with two kids grabbing at the packaging. It was a great buy! I highly recommend it for hours of playtime!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old absolutely loves it! He was a little hesitant the first few times and cried but seemed like he was overstimulated. My brother (his father) had warned me he might be like that and recommended keeping his time in the activity chair for no more than 10 minutes, 1-2 times a day when I babysit my nephew. After the second day of this (I babysit 1-2 days a week), he absolutely adores it! He's still working on figuring out the octopus but I think he would spend all of his time in the chair (other than our reading times) if I let him! I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: ShoeAddict

customer_reviews.title: Dislike
customer_reviews.text: At first my 5 month old loved it but quickly became bored with it. The purple attachment with the sticker on it got destroyed because she would chew on it and the sticker got wet and she started to ingest it. I did not like that so i threw it away. I also didn’t care for it wobbling back and forth as if it’s set on a saucer. I think it’s better for them to be stationary and stabilized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but very few issues.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The cost was perfect and my son loves all the toys and gadgets it comes with. The downside to this (you will see in the photos) one toy has stickers of turtles in it and if your kid is teething like crazy, like mine, the sticker will start to come off. I have read other people have this same issue as well as other people talk about the ribbon on the crab come apart but that hasn’t happened to mine yet and hope it doesn’t. I’d suggest for the turtle, just go ahead and peel off the stickers right when you get it and not have to worry about it later.
customer_reviews.author: John-Paul

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Has provided many hours of entertainment for my daughter. We got it for her when she was 6 months old and she continues to use it (she is currently 9 months old). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting toy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson when he was 6 months old. He is now 22 months and still likes it. When he stared walking he could pull himself up on it and play with from the outside. He is now walking and walks up to it to play with all the toys. My daughter put her bouncy exercier away several months ago but he still likes this stationery one. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: C.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep mobile baby entertained in one place
customer_reviews.text: Works great for entertaining a mobile baby for short periods of time, and doesn't use a lot of batteries. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fell apart
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived without the seat ring I t Returned it and the next one The seat came apart and the toys fall off way too easy. It may look cute but it’s not Durable. Customer service was useless on this product. But another brand.
customer_reviews.author: kellisue123

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this saucer! The toys it comes with are very interactive and there are rings where you can attach other toys to it as well. This has let me get some time to myself which has been awesome. My 6 month old loves it. You can adjust the height as well which is super nice so it can grow with your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for babies who have learned they don't like to lay down
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old loves this! She's a little young to be really entertained, but she loves standing so she would much rather be in this than on her mat. The only negative was that the music buttons were stuck when we first put it together. My husband was able to open up the music box portion and tighten a few screws on the inside that fixed it so it wasn't a big deal for us.
customer_reviews.author: RKRushingTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable legs do not stay in locked position!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, but terrible quality! Ribbon on the crab shredded, and the worst part is that the notches on the sides keep falling down no matter how many times I put them into place. It never fully locks into place which is so dangerous! Poor choice on my part ☹️
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: If your baby doesn't like this then give him time to get use to ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and hates it. This is of no fault of the product. He just likes to switch back and forth to this and his walker and crawling around and standing on this. If your baby doesn't like this then give him time to get use to it and don't leave them in there if they are upset or they will never like it.
customer_reviews.author: Chimeara

customer_reviews.title: Fun activities! and good music/sounds
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this! I started using it around 5months, and she wasn't terribly excited about it. Now at 7 months she can't get her hands on everything fast enough. The swivel seat takes a little effort for the baby to move, but it's easy to turn her in. I'll definitely keep it for the next kids. Highly recommend. Music and sounds are nice too- not too annoying :)
customer_reviews.author: madtownsarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for doing chores or housework with child nearby
customer_reviews.text: My wife and 12 year old daughter assembled this for our 7 mo son. Im not sure if they are terrible at assembling or if its actually difficult? Either way our son loves it. He loves the puh down spiral toy more than the piano
customer_reviews.author: Tim K

customer_reviews.title: Good product, happy overall
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this activity saucer. He was able to play in it a little earlier than 6 months, but that age is just about right in terms of really spinning around and playing with the different features. The only thing I think could be improved on is the side bars that adjust the height, on the stage 1 height the one insert really gave me a hard time going in, I had to shave off parts of it for it to fit in properly. Overall, happy with the product, he seems to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Height adjustments do not stay in place
customer_reviews.text: Had this saucer for about 3 weeks and the height adjustments do not stay in place I am concerned that when my daughter is bigger and heavier that the device will collapse down while she's in it beyond the lower adjustment level. This could be a crush hazard. With no option to contact seller I wanted people to know that the height adjustments are defective.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: pro 1) It able to keep a child entertained for ...
customer_reviews.text: pro 1) It able to keep a child entertained for some time thank for the various toys attachment. 2) It has some music and noise making toys attachment to help the child engage. con 1) There is no leg support at the bottom, so the base is wobbly from side to side (about 5 degrees). 2) the leg is hard to adjust for difference height.
customer_reviews.author: common usser

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice :)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 month old Granddaughter & she Loves it & we are very Happy with it...Made very Sturdy & easy to put together & Easy to clean...Very Nice Product you will enjoy with your Baby :)
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kelly

customer_reviews.title: In/Outdoor use, great for littles with head control.
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this thing! It was a gift, and I can honestly say I think this is the best gift we've received for our baby. My 4 month old loves being able to stand upright and play at the same time. This fits easily through standard door frames, making it perfect for outdoor containment of a little one! At 26inches tall we are on the second height setting, and I will be so sad when she outgrows this!
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby means happy parents
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly, easy to put together, and our little guy loves it. He spins himself around and interacts with all of the various toys on the exersaucer. His initial favorite was the racheting crab, but then he decided that flipping the whale was the best activity ever. These days he's all about making music with the little piano. Personally, I'm grateful that only the piano is electronic. The house is quieter, I don't need to change batteries constantly, and the baby is perfectly happy playing with toys that move and bend and spin without all the electronic noise.
customer_reviews.author: NNN

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for when he visits. He entertains himself while in it and is happy. The only problem when assembling it was there was no instructions for the round pieces that should be installed to help the seat swivel.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Sides won't stay locked in place
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about this! The vibrant colors, the engaging toys, the seat, etc., and my 5 month old loves it too! The only issue I have with it is it won't stay locked in place. My baby got a little taller so I moved the side pieces up a notch, and no matter how many times I do it and make sure they're "locked", after a little while of him playing and moving around in it they slip back down to the bottom notch. It definitely brings the safety value down on this toy.
customer_reviews.author: K.K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, baby digs it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to put together without reading the directions. Because I never read directions. At least at first. Until I screw something up and have to. Which usually happens. But not this time. First try success. Baby loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Alford

customer_reviews.title: Eh toys, ok overall.
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute, but under the seat material is very hard and the toys are kind of far away for my five month old to reach so she doesn’t last super long. Plus the toys don’t do much. Thought it would be way better than it is. I like the fisher price 3 in 1 way better, better toys and a more comfy seat.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and it seems like the baby loves it! Definitely a good gift...don’t know if it was easy to assemble but suspect it wasn’t too difficult. Also don’t know about cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: Great activity saucer for the little one. Has 3 height settings and its easy to put together. She loves the sound machine and all the toys mounted on the top. Great choice for the new parent.
customer_reviews.author: LoveThatDirtyWater

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute, but I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my nieces when they come over. The little octopus fell off within a week of arranging it and doesn’t stick back on. They don’t really bounce much and it’s difficult for them to spin around in the chair. It’s cute but I don’t think would purchase again. I would probably just spend a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grandbaby. She played in this toy a lot. Her parents loved that it 'spoke' several languages. I haven't heard her speaking Frenc(she's 1) but it's a cool feature. Shipping was quick and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Durable easy to clean, lightweight and adjustable for growing baby
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with a cracked tray in a strategic spot so I returned it through Amazon and got the replacement within 2 days. Very satisfied with excellent customer service, easy drop off free shipping returned at local Kohl’s. Love this product as much as my 6mos grand daughter enjoys it too!!!
customer_reviews.author: BKlein

customer_reviews.title: Loved by my twins
customer_reviews.text: I had this for my twins and also bought it as a gift to a friend. My Kids loved it to the point that they started climbing it (when old enough to do so) to get in by themselves. For parents, it's a very useful tool to keep your baby safe when they start moving around and you can't give them your full attention. Great to place in the kitchen while you're cooking for example.
customer_reviews.author: Calves

customer_reviews.title: It has such great features that grow with the child from looking and ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby LOVES this exersaucer! It has such great features that grow with the child from looking and touching, to pushing, tapping, etc. There is always a new feature they can use as they get bigger and more coordinated so they don't bore of the toy! It's been amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great learning experience for the baby
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together and the baby really like being able to go around to get to all the different things and it helps us a lot because he can stay in one place yet still use his legs
customer_reviews.author: chevy guy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: bought this in 2015 for our 1st grandson and bought it again for our 2nd grandson this Spring. Babies love it, helps build their legs, dexterity, learn to grasp and play.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie 718

customer_reviews.title: colorful and the activity items are easily manipulated by her
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves the activities on it! It is bright, colorful and the activity items are easily manipulated by her. She was 6 months at the time of purchase and is now 8 months and still enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together. My daughter loves it! I bought it for her when she was 4 months and she is now 6 months and still loves it! I would say the crab is her favorite because she loves eating the ribbons on it and it makes a clicking sound as you spin him. Plus, she learned new skills using this toy!
customer_reviews.author: 5-0Family

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I did because my baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My baby is a bit young about 4 1/2 months but he is really is on the go, so I looked into other products similar this. I decided give this one a try. I am glad I did because my baby loves it. He enjoys the bright colors..
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and very durable toy for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Baby is fascinated with all the activities this offers! Easy to put together and very durable toy for a baby boy. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to put together. My 12 year old did it for me. It’s super cute and isn’t super annoying like some can be. My 1 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Ray

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, I think it took me a total of 20 minutes? It's adorable and seems durable so far. My only issue is in the bottom middle of the blue layer, the center has sharp plastic that needs to be filed down. Especially since that's where her feet will be hitting. Other than that it's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for busy babies
customer_reviews.text: I was worried at 1st because of all the reviews about babies eating off the stickers. But there is only one item that has a sticker on it so it's not that big of a deal at all. It is very cute with each toy being a different activity.
customer_reviews.author: Erich Davison

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! Wish we had purchased it sooner
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Wish we had purchased it sooner. Our daughter is a couple week shy of 6 months and loves this. She immediately starting playing with all of the pieces. Easy to assemble although the instructions could be a little better but it is pretty much plug and play. She loves the details such as the ribbon on the red crab. Great job Baby Einstein!
customer_reviews.author: Harts101010

customer_reviews.title: I like how it has a bottom to it so we ...
customer_reviews.text: Baby adores playing with all the colorful activities on this saucer! I like how it has a bottom to it so we can out it outside, and we keep little snacks in the compartment for him, too. Definitely a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Baby sitter lol
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had some lights on it or more music the toys get boring for him but he loves to stand and it’s great for that
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Krause

customer_reviews.title: There are much better jumpers
customer_reviews.text: This one is not stable and it makes the baby bounce back and forth which is really bad for their little spine.
customer_reviews.author: Mori Amitai

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment for baby
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my granddaughter entertained. I recommended it strongly. Are used one for my youngest son was very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love our exersaucer!
customer_reviews.text: Orded this for my 4 month old, now 5 months. Several activities that keep his attention. Height is perfect for him in the lowest position. He is 26 inches long now and still using the lowest position. Was about 25 inches when we bought it. Has extra eyelets to attach his toys as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Sha

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 4 month son. He sits well in it and feet touch the floor on lowest setting but I use folded towel for added support under his arms. Makes it easier for him to reach and hold on to toys until he becomes more mobile. I only use it for 15-20 minutes at a time throughout the day but it helps so he doesn't spend too much time on his back. He only tolerates tummy time about 20-30 minutes at a time so I needed more options. So far item works great and not overloaded with too many things. Very bright and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Broken music box.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with a broken music box. Sad to see this has happened to others. Really sad to learn this has painted parts on it that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to have!
customer_reviews.text: My boy is 4 months and loves it! Worth the money. It has adjustable height options and lots to do. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Baby K’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for Baby
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing! My son, a toddler, also loves it. Plenty of things to play with and learn from.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Dean

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave ease of cleaning only 3 stars because there so many areas to clean. But the seat cover is removable to wash but not sure how well it would do. But for fun I give it 5 stars. My grandson loves it. Keeps him interested.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn C

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and have him package that with one of the toys still attached to the tray, which resulted in the toy snapping off inside of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria S.

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Keeps child entertained and helps strengthen leg muscles. Height adjustable but can be tricky as the buttons push in hard.
customer_reviews.author: Ang-a-bee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fun for a growin
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 5 months old granddaughter. The style suits her because she sits up better and the objects are closer for her to manipulate, play with and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, hes been able to use it for around 5 months, it's grown with him and it's really easy to clean the fabric when puffs inevitably get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This saucer keeps our 5 month baby entertained and happy longer then any of his other toys! He started out in it at 4 months propped up in the seat and now is standing up and rocking and spinning and loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Biron

customer_reviews.title: Our babies love this and so do we
customer_reviews.text: Our babies love this and so do we, I would recommend it and probably buy it again. The only complaint is that you can't lock it in place. Other than that it's great
customer_reviews.author: Jenna S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this saucer!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this saucer and I love the bright colors. I also love that the tray is white so I can see anything on it that needs to be be cleaned. I bought an extra one for her to use at daycare she loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Day

customer_reviews.title: Einstein is a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Our little Einstein loves this toy. The individual toys are entertaining and keep our little guy occupied. Assembly was a piece of cake (especially for me since my husband did the work)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I went with this model!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! Easy to assemble, and is so cute. I'm so glad I went with this particular product. It is a great value, and I can tell my son will have months and months of fun in it. I highly recommend for girls or boys. There is no need to spend $100+ for a good activity center for your little one!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Love It!! Glad I didn't listen to bad reviews and purchased
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure saw some bad reviews but bought anyway, baby is not ever alone in it and didn't understand all the negative comments. Anyway working great baby is growing and level two is being used. He loves it and finds enjoyment and stimulation.
customer_reviews.author: Evenengle

customer_reviews.title: Great! Our baby boy loves... occupies him and frees us up to get stuff done around the house.
customer_reviews.text: Our baby boy loves this. Good quality. Good adjustability. Safe. No risk of tipping. A solid product that is fitting for the good reputation Baby Einstein has.
customer_reviews.author: Beaker Slice

customer_reviews.title: Great Infant seat!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! My grandson loved this seat! Promotes leg strength. Toys within arms length.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Brown

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I expected from an Einstein product. Missing parts and no legs to change to a stationary position. Fabric seat was a bit difficult to put on and does not fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: First one came broken, thanks to Amazon’s great returns, got another fairly quickly. Assembled pretty easily, some parts were a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Peckerhead

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this saucer, my granddaughter loves it too. ( except when she doesn't want to be corralled)😀 It does keep her occupied when I need to get things done without her hanging on my pant leg. The company is sending me a free replacement for one of the toys that my older grandchild broke. Very nice of them since it was our fault.
customer_reviews.author: J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: 7 month old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My seven month old loves this thing. We just keep it in the kitchen and she plays in there while I cook and clean.. or take a bathroom break, haha. Everything came shipped as described and nothing was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product! My baby girl loves it! It's light and easy to move around the house so she can be by me, there's lots for her to play with, the sounds it makes are not super annoying (like most baby toys), you can spin the kid to look at different toys when they get bored with one, and you can spin the whole thing so your kid can face you while playing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. The item is colorful and perfect for my little one! I love that the legs are adjustable and that is is sturdy. The little mirror is perfect for a little one who is exploring themselves. The buttons take a little time for any baby to learn to use, but once mastered they are easy to push. Overall pretty pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love This!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE! I honestly love most Baby Einstein items, which is why we chose this one! But it is way better than expected and my 7 month old just loves it to pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Lowrey

customer_reviews.title: Safe durable, boring
customer_reviews.text: Average toy. Safe and durable. Not enough interactive attachments. Itens dont spin, or do much at all. Kids get bored quick.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: if baby likes it, i like it! One thing i do wish, is that it had springs in the supports, so that it would bounce more. Our grandson is a hard bouncer! The bouncer he has at his house has some kind of springs in it I think. Other than that, I love it......1
customer_reviews.author: CalMom

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining for baby
customer_reviews.text: Took the baby a while to be able to play with it but now at 8 months he really loves it. I also liked it because it was without the arch which I find annoying on similar items
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Perfect for our 4 mos old daughter. Colorful. Clean. Package just right and quick shipping with prime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Finally I have found something that keeps my 6 month old son occupied longer than 30 seconds! He likes all the toys and the fact that he can turn and move around on his own! Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: bigAL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, sturdy, and easy to clean. Not convertable, wobbly for when babies can stand and want to play while standing outside of the activity center.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR SIMULATION & SAFE SPOT
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Stimulating and easy to clean or move around the house. Great for entertaining the baby and keeping him safe when I need to do some chores around the house.
customer_reviews.author: GHarvey

customer_reviews.title: Gramzi' house just got better
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy. It's colorful. It's interactive. The adjustable heights and varied sensory options make this an easy five star. Easy to assemble and ready for the grand babies to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Gramzi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, easy setup, baby loves it. At 4 months she would only stay in it about 10 minutes. Now at 5 months she really likes it and it frees my hands from a clingy baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very colorful and Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: It was really pretty easy to assemble. Seems like it will hold up- very bright and colorful! My grand-daughter really seems to enjoy talking to all her "friends". Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby!
customer_reviews.text: Our twin girls love these. They have had them from about 4 mos to 10 mos and still love them.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: ... the time so his mom wanted one for home good
customer_reviews.text: grandson plays in mine all the time so his mom wanted one for home good investment
customer_reviews.author: Veesworthy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandbabies love this set up. My only complaint is getting around all the activities and crevices to clean is a task.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Holmstrom

product_meta.title: Baby Einstein Rhythm of The Reef Activity Saucer
product_meta.description: Style:Rhythm of the ReefWith a 360-degree swivel seat, babies can easily spin from toy to toy and enjoy all the Baby Einstein activity this baby saucer has to offer. The Baby Einstein Rhythm of the Reef Activity Saucer has ocean-themed activities and soothing ocean sounds to keep your baby captivated, comfortable and content. Little ones love standing tall in their saucer and jumping with joy at their new view of the world. They’ll enjoy exploring a dozen toys and activity centers, like the spinning Orca whale, electronic piano and tropical fish toy. The octopus bead popper and bead chaser will encourage motor skills, while the hanging toys will help your baby with hand-eye coordination. With three easily adjustable height positions, this activity saucer will grow with your baby and their sense of curiosity.
feature_bullets: Invites baby to discover an underwater world of wonder
Seat rotates 360 degree for easier access to toys
Machine-washable seat pad features Baby Neptune and friends. Alkaline contained battery type
Adjustable height positions grow with baby. Built-in toy tray is easy to clean
Recommended for babies that can sit up unassisted and is less than 30 inch tall. Weighs less than 25 pounds
